protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. All signals were divided by median value of all probe sets. Ln value of MAS5.0 signal intensity divided by median value of all non-control probe sets. ID_REF =  VALUE = Signal ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M) DETECTION P-VALUE =
Seven-day-old plants were transferred to the 1/2 MS medium plates with or without NaCl, and cultured for additional 2 days.
Seedlings were were grown at 22Â°C under the LD condition (16 h light/8 h dark) on the 1/2 strength MS medium.
Total RNA was extracted using RNeasy Mini kit (Qiagen) following instruction.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 ug total RNA.
Following fragmentation, 15 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000.
